title: The easiest way to have a full XP booting from USB?

forumNotes.author: Qbert
forumNotes.content:
Sorry... after hours of reading, I'm getting crazy. Please, help me!  

I would like to have a FULL XP installation bootable from USB HDD and I wonder what' is the easiest way.  

I've already used PWBoot and NT 6.x fast installer succesfully. But they work only with Win7. Is something similar for XP?   

TY

forumNotes.author: Qbert
forumNotes.content:
I found this: usboot.org  
I will give it a try

forumNotes.author: wimb
forumNotes.content:
